title: iDigital
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.description: Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. is closing in on a roughly $18 billion deal to acquire the Dutch coffee company JDE Peet’s NV, the Wall Street Journal reported ...

items.title: ‘I can only rely on me’: How do I protect myself from my parents’ nursing-home bills?
items.description: “I do not expect or need anything from my parents.”

items.title: Developers lose focus 1,200 times a day — how MCP could change that
items.description: One of the most impactful applications of MCP is its ability to connect AI coding assistants directly to developer tools.

items.title: ‘I learned a hard lesson’: My ex-husband gambled away our $900,000 life savings. Do I use my 401(k) to buy a home?
items.description: “I have about $80,000 in my 401(k) and $10,000 in savings.”

items.title: As a nurse, I’ve seen people use their power of attorney to take advantage of their parents. It would chill you to the bone.
items.description: “Even if someone has millions of dollars in retirement, that won’t keep them from being trapped in the hospital.”

items.title: U.S. stock futures flat following Friday’s Fed-fueled rally
items.description: U.S. stock-market futures were little changed Sunday, after stocks rallied Friday on fresh hopes of a September rate cut by the Fed.

items.title: Busted by the em dash — AI’s favorite punctuation mark, and how it’s blowing your cover
